result.correct_soap_P: We discussed his dental concerns and recommended scheduling an implant evaluation to explore replacement options for the extracted teeth, such as bridges and implants. Since he prefers virtual consultations, we will arrange a remote meeting to review the treatment plan and discuss sedation options, ensuring nitrous oxide is avoided due to his genetic concerns. We also recommended working with him to find a treatment schedule that accommodates his demanding job and personal needs.
result.correct_soap_S: The patient states he has ongoing concerns about infected teeth that need extraction and feels anxious about proceeding with deep cleaning after receiving a notice that these services were deemed medically unnecessary. He reports serious concerns about using nitrous oxide due to a genetic mutation (MTHFR) and potential side effects. Given that he lives an hour away from the dental office, he prefers virtual consultations whenever possible. The patient also reports that his demanding job as a heavy-duty fleet mechanic impacts his overall health and complicates his ability to schedule treatments.
